experiences.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Led the frontend development team in creating responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Implemented state management with Redux and integrated REST APIs.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed full-stack applications using the MERN stack. Created RESTful APIs, implemented authentication systems, and designed database schemas for various client projects.

experiences.title: Junior Web Developer
experiences.description: Built and maintained websites for small to medium businesses. Worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress. Collaborated with designers to implement responsive layouts.
